content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    ResourceName,
    sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as Cost 
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/20230901-20230930/Extended_v2_ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_202309*.parquet/part*.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'

    WHERE UPPER(ResourceName) IN
